title: Schedule Preventive Maintenance for a Crane
description: A ship-to-shore (STS) crane is due for its 500-hour preventive maintenance check. The maintenance planner must schedule it.

tasks.description: Identify all cranes approaching their preventive maintenance (PM) service intervals.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner generates a report showing crane QC-03 is due for its 500-hour PM.

tasks.description: Check the terminal's operational schedule to find a low-traffic window to take the crane offline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner identifies a 4-hour window on Wednesday with no vessel operations at the crane's berth.

tasks.description: Create a maintenance work order and assign it to the engineering team for the identified window.
tasks.expected_outcome: A work order for the PM is created and scheduled in the maintenance system.
